description: SUMMARY: The Department of Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC) has a requirement for twenty four hours a day, seven days a week (24/7) Oracle PeopleSoft rapid response support services to assist with critical Phoenix Pay System issues involving Oracle’s PeopleSoft software.
duration_in_months: Just a test note about obtained expertise drones cyber involvement

full_summary:
#### Oracle Peoplesoft Rapid Response Support Services
(Contract Name)

### Announcement Details
* [Purchase Number]: WS4412852591
* [Contract Amendment Number]: 1
* [Publication Date]: February 22, 2024
* [Tender Closing Date]: March 8, 2024, at 14:00 EST
* [Expected Contract Commencement Date]: April 12, 2024
* [Expected Contract Termination Date]: Ongoing

### Tender Details
* [Tender Type]: Advance Contract Award Notice (ACAN)
* [Procurement Method]: ACAN
* [Trade Agreements]: This tender is subject to the following international trade agreements:
  * Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
  * Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
  * Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
  * Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
  * Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
  * Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
  * Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
  * Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
  * World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
  * Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
  * Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
  * Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* [Contract Category]: Services (SRV)

### End-User Entities
The contract is intended for the exclusive use of the following end-user entities:
* Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)

### Contracting Entity Details
* Contracting Entity: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* Contracting Entity Address:
	+ Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, QC, K1A 0S5
	+ Country: Canada

### Contact Information
* Contact Name: Andre Serpa
* Contact Email: [andre.serpa@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:andre.serpa@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
* Contact Phone: Not available
* Contact Fax: Not available
* Contact Address: Not available

### Tender Description
The Department of Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC) requires twenty-four hours a day, seven days a week (24/7) Oracle Peoplesoft rapid response support services to
